name: trajectory
description: Self-hosted growth and medical history tracking application

scripts.install:all: npm install && npm install --prefix backend && npm install --prefix frontend
scripts.dev: npm run dev:backend & npm run dev:frontend
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend
scripts.clean: rimraf node_modules backend/node_modules frontend/node_modules backend/dist frontend/dist
scripts.docker:seed: docker compose exec app node dist/scripts/seed-mock-data.js
scripts.docker:seed:clear: docker compose exec app node dist/scripts/seed-mock-data.js --clear
